title: Jolly Farm Revue
description: Join Mother Maggie, Melody Sheep, and Pengrove Pig for a story and sing-along at Jolly Farm. And welcome Bernie and Gert, Large Bird, and Moody Green Garbage Creature for the American version.
quote: The sun has risen on another day on Jolly Farm. Let’s see what life’s rich pageant has in store for us!
